column2: Hi, Warm Greetings! We are looking for a  Warehouse Management  role with good experience in SAP MM, Kanban, FIFO, JIT and only Female can apply. This Opportunity for a reputed MNC Organization based at Bangalore Location.   Description - External  SCOPE:  Manage plant warehousing & subcontracting function, and drive efficiency and elimination of all waste in the warehouse & subcontracting premises.  Ensure proper material handling and providing at Plant Guarantee accuracy of physical & logical stocks and maintain inventory control.  Ensure effective customer order management and on time delivery of materials. Manage and develop people in the warehousing & subcontracting function by training, developing and mentoring performance.  Budgeting Prepare budget for local transportation and packing material based on volume requirements. Also plan for international transportation including air and sea freight.  Closely monitor expenses and maintain within budget limit a SPS implementation and Warehouse  Management Establish KANBAN system, train the employees and contract operators on implementing KANBAN system; Implement material providing and handling system as per SPS.  Monitor performance of the water spider and review with warehouse team on a weekly basis.  Establish and maintain FIFO system and review periodically.  Monitor House Keeping in the warehouse and work towards improving the same. Review 5 S audits and recommend and implement corrective action.  Establish safety systems in the warehouse and ensure safe practices.  Inventory Management and Control Perform age analysis once in a year; Perform ABC FMR Analysis once in a quarter for all the parts along with procurement and determine the procurement cycle time for all the parts. Prepare a document based on ABC FMR analysis and recommend proposals on disposal of non-moving items.  Prepare the daily cycle count schedule and ensure execution of the same on a daily basis to establish stock accuracy. Perform periodical inventory audits to ensure stock accuracy and implementation of cycle count schedule. Incase of discrepancies in system stock and physical stock, analyze the causes and take corrective action.  Make recommendations to procurement team on organizing the materials as per Just In Time (JIT) concept. Fix safety stocks for semi finished goods and finished goods and ensure availability as per requirements.  Handling C&F agents and Freight. Identify efficient and effective transporters / C& F agents. Establish agreements with them and use them effectively to transport materials. Work on freight cost reduction by judicially clubbing consignments in such a way that the cost is reduced and at the same time OTDM is maintained. Choose transporters depending on there quality and cost of service. Depending on requirement of materials choose effective mode of transportation either through air or sea and control freight cost.  Sub-Contractor Management Based on the orders from the DCs, plan the RM supply schedule to sub contractors on a weekly basis. Ensure implementation as per schedule; Audit sub-contractor premises on a monthly basis to ensure proper warehousing and stock accuracy.  Validate the reconciliation report of physical Vs System stock at subcontractor premises. Review the subcontractors performance on quality and delivery on a monthly basis and suggest corrective actions. Prepare dashboards and forward the same to manager materials Leadership  Systems / Process development Design and establish suitable systems processes appropriate to functional and organizational requirements. Set clear directions to team members in effectively executing the systems / processes. Participate in internal/cross functional / SIM meetings to track performance; Analyse and identify root cause and eliminate the same. Ensure corrective / preventive action and drive continual improvements. Leadership   People Development Set Objectives and KPI to all direct reportees in line with the company and Plant objectives. Continuously monitor and mentor direct reportees to achieve the set targets. Conduct Half yearly and Annual appraisals. Identify and Promote talent. Identify training needs and in coordination with Human  Required Skills:  SAP MM User Level Proficiency  Microsoft Applications Excel, Power Point - Middle level  Stake holder management skills  Analytical Skills  Team Management  Good communication  Conflict Management and Problem solving  Qualifications - External  Full time BE/B.Tech Graduate with Min. of 10 Years of Experience in Supply Chain Plant warehouse Management with Downstream Planning & Upstream planning  If you are interested, please share your cv to  gowsalya@bvrpc.com Thanks & Regards, Gowsalya

column2: Objective- We are looking for a candidate who can handle the whole production department The main objective of production engineering is integration of technology with management in planning and controlling the design, development and operation of manufacturing system. Job Role -  Production Manager Roles and Responsibility   1.Handle the production and checking material availability while ensuring efficiency and quality. Manage assembly line to ensure maximum productivity and quality. Must have experience in managing a large-scale work force. 2. Ensure efficient production as per highest standards. Manage and handle production team operations and requirements with the discussion of managements, plan and execute productions, check raw materials availability as per requirements. 3. Should be responsible for proper working on assembly lines & ensure production is done in an efficient manner and in accordance with highest standards. The role includes recruitment, training and supervision of workers, planning products which are manufactured by employees, checking raw materials available at the plant, inspecting the finished products for quality control and checking whether they meet customer requirements. The worker plays a key role in organizing production procedures according to established standards for each separate unit. 4. Troubleshooting and repair of various systems, consulted with businesses, industrial, and homeowners regarding CCTV, IP Camera, Bio-Metric, Fire Alarms All Type of security system needs. 5. supervising and improving production at plants and factories. They support engineering teams, draw up safety protocols, report issues to the manager, and develop strategies to improve efficiency and profit.         Educational Qualification- Graduate Post-Graduate (ITI/B.Tech/M.Tech) Experience required 1-6 Years  Job Type: Full-time Salary: Negotiable ITI/B.Tech/M.Tech/Diploma in Engineering will be considered with same background experience.

column2: Conduct inspections, tests, and assessments on raw materials, in-process materials, and finished products to ensure compliance with quality standards and specifications Perform visual inspections, measurements, and functional tests to identify defects, deviations, or non-conformities Follow standard operating procedures (SOPs) and protocols for sampling, testing, and analysis of materials and products Document and report inspection and test results accurately and in a timely manner Identify and communicate quality issues or trends to the appropriate stakeholders, including supervisors, managers, and other cross-functional teams Investigate and analyze root causes of quality problems, deviations, or non-conformities, and propose corrective actions or process improvements Participate in the development and implementation of quality control procedures, protocols, and systems Ensure proper calibration and maintenance of equipment used for inspections and testing Assist in the qualification and validation of equipment, processes, and methods Support internal and external audits, inspections, and regulatory compliance activities Provide training and guidance to other team members on quality control procedures and practices Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including production, engineering, and supply chain, to address quality-related issues and implement corrective actions Stay updated with industry regulations, standards, and best practices related to quality control Contribute to continuous improvement initiatives and participate in quality-related projectsRole & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: 01 Procurement   Process 1. Identifying suppliers: The   Purchase Engineer is responsible for identifying potential suppliers of   materials, equipment, and services needed for the production process. 2. Negotiating prices: The   Purchase Engineer is responsible for negotiating prices with suppliers to   ensure that the company gets the best possible price for the required   materials, equipment, and services. 3. Evaluating supplier   performance: The Purchase Engineer is responsible for evaluating the   performance of suppliers based on factors such as quality, delivery time, and   price. 4. Managing procurement process:   The Purchase Engineer is responsible for managing the procurement process,   including placing orders, tracking deliveries, and managing inventory levels. 5. Managing relationships with   suppliers: The Purchase Engineer is responsible for building and maintaining   good relationships with suppliers to ensure a steady supply of high-quality   materials, equipment, and services. 6. Collaborating with other   departments: The Purchase Engineer must collaborate with other departments,   such as production, quality control, and engineering, to ensure that   procurement activities are aligned with company goals and objectives. 7. Ensuring compliance with   regulations: The Purchase Engineer is responsible for ensuring that   procurement activities comply with industry regulations and standards. 8. Preparing purchase orders,   contracts, and agreements for the procurement of materials and services. 9. Monitoring and analyzing   market trends and identifying potential new suppliers to ensure a reliable   supply of materials. 10. Maintaining accurate records   of procurement activities and preparing reports for management. 11. Prepare schedules for   Material Procurement along with technical evaluation of   parameters/specifications and schedules

column2: Job Position - Executive - Production Planning & Inventory Control Role & responsibilities     1.   Production Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive production plans to meet customer demand while optimizing resources and minimizing lead times. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather relevant information, including sales forecasts, production capacities, and resource availability. 2.   Inventory Control: Manage inventory levels to ensure optimal balance between meeting customer demand and minimizing excess or obsolete stock. Implement and maintain inventory control policies and procedures, including regular cycle counts, stock reconciliations, and variance analysis. 3.   Demand Forecasting: Utilize historical data, market trends, and customer forecasts to generate accurate demand forecasts. Collaborate with sales, marketing, and finance teams to gather relevant information and insights for improved forecasting accuracy. 4.   Continuous Improvement: Identify and implement process improvements in production planning and inventory control to enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging technologies to drive continuous improvement in supply chain management. 5.   Communication and Collaboration: Ensure effective communication and collaboration across departments to ensure alignment on production plans and inventory strategies. Work closely with logistics, procurement, and manufacturing teams to address any issues or bottlenecks in the supply chain. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelors degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field. experience in production planning and inventory control, in food/ Pharma manufacturing company. Perks and benefits   Transportation facility Canteen facility Family Mediclaim facility Accidental Insurance facility

column1: Production Associate - Tamil Nadu Urban Sanitation Support Programme
column2: About the Tamil Nadu Urban Sanitation Support Programme (TNUSSP) The TNUSSP was launched in November 2015, as the Techncial Support Unit (TSU) for the?Government of Tamil Nadu (GoTN) to make improvements in fecal sludge and septage?management (FSSM) along the full cycle of sanitation (FCS) across Tamil Nadu. A consortium?of organisations, the programme is led by the Indian Institute for Human Settlements (IIHS) to?make clean water and sanitation accessible. For more information on TNUSSP, please see?https://tnussp.co.in/ Job Description Sanitation workers play a crucial role in the sanitation service chain, ensuring efficient and effective delivery of sanitation services to urban populations. Despite their essential role, many of these workers are employed on a part-time or irregular basis, which can lead to unstable incomes and livelihood insecurity. Recognizing this challenge, IIHS (Indian Institute for Human Settlements) has undertaken experiments to explore alternative livelihood opportunities for sanitation workers. These experiments have identified several options with the potential for scaling up. For example, providing training, product development, tie-ups with input suppliers and marketing support have helped in setting up recycled wastepaper product manufacturing as a potential option. Additionally, working with Self-Help Groups (SHGs) of sanitation workers can enable them to collectively address common challenges such as access to resources, common facility centers, scale of operation, etc. By investing in alternative livelihood initiatives, IIHS aims to improve the economic well-being and social empowerment of sanitation workers while enhancing the overall resilience and sustainability of urban sanitation systems. TNUSSP is looking for a production associate to support the work for the development of alternative livelihoods for sanitation workers and their family members. The role demands a thorough understanding of the product portfolio manufactured by the target SHGs. This person shall be committed to working with target SHGs to improve their product portfolio, ensure quality or production at optimum cost, and timely delivery of orders, etc. The position presents an exciting prospect to work with SHGs to help them improve their product portfolio aimed at catering to urban markets, thereby nurturing economic avenues and empowering marginalized communities. This is a contractual position for an initial term of 11 months. Activities and Tasks Responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following: Interacting closely with the Marketing Associate to understand the requirements of market players (buyers) in terms of quality, quantity, and any other needs; Translating the requirements of buyers for easy understanding of the SHG members and helping them produce goods aligned with the requirements of the buyer; Developing and implementing production schedules to meet customer demand while minimizing waste and cost; Establishing and enforcing quality control standards to ensure the production of high-quality products; Developing Standard Operating Procedures (SoPs) to produce each type of product manufactured by the SHGs to standardise the production process; Implementing continuous process improvement initiatives to enhance product quality and consistency; Working with designers and other stakeholders to improve product quality, design; Continuously scanning the market to procure quality raw materials at optimum cost; Identifying bottlenecks in the production process and implementing process improvement for increased efficiency; Managing production budgets, controlling expenses, and ensuring cost-effective operation; Maintaining accurate production records including production reports, inventory levels, and quality control data; Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others; Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and travelling on IIHS work within the country as and when needed. Structure and Reporting The production associate will be an External Consultant coordinating with the livelihoods expert on the TNUSSP team and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organisations. Person Specification The ideal candidate should have: A professional degree in Product Design and Development, Development Studies, Social Work, or a related discipline; 2-5 years of relevant experience in providing production support to urban livelihoods projects; Experience of working in multi-disciplinary teams; Good people management skills; Proficiency in Tamil language is mandatory. This is a contractual position for an initial term of 11 months. This offer is on an exclusive basis, which implies that other professional assignments (whether compensated or not) that bear a potential conflict of interest with the IIHS cannot be undertaken. The search will remain open until the position is filled. Location This position is based in Trichy and may entail travel to other locations in Tamil Nadu. Review and Assessment The role and performance of the incumbent shall be subject to normal review and assessment systems at IIHS. Diversity Policy IIHS is an equal opportunity employer that encourages women, people with disabilities and those from economically and socially excluded communities with the requisite skills and qualifications to apply for positions.

column2: Responsibilities : Design and develop a fail-safe control system for the HiPCO reactor, including temperature and pressure monitoring, sensor integration, and heater control. Utilize expertise in TRIACS, SCR, and Thyristor circuits to ensure optimal performance and reliability of the control system. Design heaters of 2KW and above using Nikrothal elements, considering electrical characteristics and thermal management. Program or guide the team in programming using Python for control system implementation and automation. Utilize and program PLCs (Programmable Logic Controllers) for efficient control system operation and integration. Apply strong circuit design knowledge and understanding of electrical and electronics engineering principles to develop robust control system architectures. Test control systems thoroughly to ensure safe and reliable operation, considering life-critical applications. Continuously update and improve control systems based on performance feedback and technological advancements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including process engineers and technicians, to ensure seamless integration of control systems. Document control system designs, specifications, test procedures, and maintenance guidelines. Requirements : Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Instrumentation Engineering or a related field. Master's degree is preferred. Proven practical experience (3-4 years) in designing and implementing control systems for complex industrial processes. Practical Hands-on Expertise in TRIACS, SCR, and Thyristor circuits, with a strong understanding of their applications and limitations. Practical Knowledge and experience in designing heaters of 2KW and above using Nikrothal elements is preferred. Proficiency in Python programming for control system implementation and automation. Experience with PLCs and their programming, with the ability to integrate them into control systems effectively. Strong understanding of circuit design principles and electrical engineering fundamentals. Practical experience in the application of electrical and electronics engineering principles to real-world systems. Familiarity with popular controllers and PLCs is a bonus. Knowledge of SCADA (Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition) for system architecture is a bonus. Proven ability to test and validate control systems and troubleshoot issues effectively. Excellent documentation skills and attention to detail. Enthusiasm to work in a startup environment, with a self-starter attitude. Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Job description Job Responsibility SQC - Supplier Quality Control a) Implementation of Final Quality testing as per manufacturing Quality Plan b) Final Quality Audit as per Defined Frequency and manufacturing Quality Plan c) NC management and Identification and Traceability of Non-conforming Materials d) Perform Data Analysis for Post- Lamination Defects(Visual / EL / IV/ HV) and preparation of Root cause analysis and Action plan for Reduction of Post-Lamination Defects e) Ensure quality audits; record and analyze feedback and initiate follow-up audits where necessary and review of the Corrective action implemented. f) Devise test methods and inspection processes to ensure adherence to specifications based on international standards and best practices in the industry. g) Monthly reporting and analysis of rejection levels with root cause and identify action areas to ensure early detection and reduction in rejections to enable productivity. h) Perform Root cause /FMEA / SPC / 7 QC tools analysis of process/Production/Quality Issues associated with Module Production line i) Implement and Execution of On-Job training to shop floor Operators for corrective actions of issue. j) Daily and Monthly MIS. column2: US MNC : Manufacturing Process Engineer @ Mumbai  Our client offers miniature motor technologies to solve the motion needs of a spectrum of end markets, from medical devices to various industrial applications that save, improve, & enhance lives. We serve our customers through breadth of innovative product technologies to optimize application performance. They are part of the Large US Group , which is a leading, global manufacturer of airflow, motion control, power transmission & power generation solutions used in commercial, industrial, & residential settings. Current headcount exceeds 29,000 associates  Department   :  Manufacturing  Reports to:  Advance Manufacturing Manager  Position Summary:  Handled turnkey projects start from Laying the  Layout ,  Set-Up Of Equipment's  &  Productionize  to hand over.  Responsible for the delivery of  Advanced Engineered Solutions  by developing  Jigs & Fixture, Low-Cost Automation  & working on  Continuous Improvement Tools  for improving the Safety, Quality, Cost & Productivity using  Lean Tools & Six Sigma  tools.  Identify the supplier, estimate the cost & make the Techno commercial proposal to management for approval.  Responsible for  trialing out  the process with proper qualification & by updating the process documentation (like SOP, Setting procedure, etc.)  Will collaborate with stakeholders such as manufacturing, maintenance & quality for smooth Handover by providing training.  Monitor & reporting monthly/Quarterly/Half yearly to finance regarding overall  CAPEX (Budget Vs Actual).   Implementation of  Ind 4.0  regarding  M2M connectivity  using  IoT  & Integrate with Software to Provide a  Digital platform  for Manufacturing.  Education & Experience:  Bachelors Degree in Mechanical/ Production /Mechatronics/ Electrical Engineering with 4+ years of work experience  Essential Duties & Responsibilities:  Responsible for working with Stakeholder for understanding the requirement for developing a  new equipment Set-up  a  New Line Upgrading  of existing line/Equipment.  Responsible for understanding  Customer Requirement  & translate into  Technical Specification  by considering the product & Process characteristic, Safety, ergonomics, Poka-yoke & others etc.,  Create & development concept drawing of making  New Assembly Lines / Special Purpose Machines / Jigs & Fixtures- Tooling & Other Test  benches development.  Responsible for discussing the concept with stakeholders, getting mutual understanding & getting initial buy for making the proposal.  Responsible for implementing  Manufacturing Flow Charts, Standard Work, procedures, Control Plans & FMEAs  as prescribed by  ISO  standards & Business system. (For New Line/Existing line)  Responsible for Sending an enquiry to different supplier to get quotes, make the techno commercial comparison &  evaluate  in terms of  Function, Performance & Cost aspects.   Responsible for Raising the Capex by making the  Budgetary Proposal  along with justification for Management approval.  Co-ordinate & ensure for release Purchase order to supplier on time.  Responsible for  qualification of the tools equipment  or  Line / Layout mapping  etc. at both suppliers' end plant end as well.  Responsible for Making documentation such as SOP | WI | Manuals etc.  Responsible for providing training to the operator & other stakeholders from Manufacturing / Maintenance / Quality.  Responsible for Troubleshooting in Process Equipment & tools by using the  Problem-Solving  techniques.  Responsible & ensure to make a report regarding the Performance of the  Process Equipment Tools | Assembly Line  etc. in terms of  OEE  Responsible to hand over & sign off process equipment Tools , Assembly line to concern stakeholder for the smooth transition from Projects to Manufacturing.  Experience working in a team environment under time & resource pressures.  Responsible in Mapping  Ind 4.0  requirement for connecting  Machine to Machine  using  IoT device  & Integrate with Equipment  Weekly & Monthly report out of Project status  Functional Competencies:  Ability to conceptualize, design & develop  SPM  with  Low-Cost Automation.   Ability to conceptualize, design & development of efficient  Jigs, Fixtures  preferably with automation as feasible (  Assembly tools | Spot   Welding / Laser welding  etc)  Thorough understanding of  GD&T, Tolerance stack-up , Engineering Material properties,  DFM  concepts,  Ergonomics & Poka-Yokes  while proposing any change in the manufacturing set-up as well as designing new manufacturing lines. Hands on experience of  Process planning, Execution, Line balancing, Capacity Planning & Production Ramp - by using  Gnatt Chart/MS Projects   Hands on experience in  Welding Technology  like  Resistance | Plasma | Laser , in terms of  electrode selection, parameter setting  & optimization.  Hands on experience in design of  Pneumatic Circuits  & selecting of Pneumatic products based on the application. etc.  Exposure on  PLC  like defining  I/Ps & O/Ps & Sequence.   Hands on experience in selecting the  PLC , develop programming & execute the program with the application (Added Advantage)  Exposure in problems solving technique such as by implementing  SPC, poka-yoke  & other problem-solving tools (e.g.  Six Sigma )  Hands on experience on making Part drawings| Assembly drawing| details drawing using software such as  AutoCAD|3D  Modelling such as Solid works/Creo .etc Knowledge & experience working on MS Office & MS Projects.  Knowledge & Experience working on  Ind. 4.0   Software Experience:  3D Modeling software - Creo SolidWorks.  2D Drafting AutoCAD.  Pneumatic Design of Pneumatic Circuit in Fluid draw, SMC pneudraw etc.  PLC  Ladder Diagram  Mitusubshi, OMRON, Delta etc.  Lean Tools- Line Balancing, VSM, SMED & OEE etc.  Six Sigma tools- (Preferred Knowledge on DOE, Anova, Process Capability, Gage R &R)  MS- Projects- Project Management  MS-Office Skills : Word, Excel, & PowerPoint  Key Relationships:  Internal:  Manufacturing, Quality, R&D, Purchase, PT2 team ,  Direct labor  External:  Tooling suppliers  Personal Trait/Profile:  Ability to apply engineering & scientific principles & disciplines like Problem Analysis & Root  Cause Corrective Action; Statistical Process Control; Design of Experiments; Process Validation,  Facilities Layout & Process Design. column2: Role & responsibilities   Routine Maintenance   -       - Perform scheduled maintenance tasks on   production equipment according to established maintenance schedules. -   Inspect, clean, and lubricate machinery components to ensure proper   functioning. Troubleshooting and Repairs -      -   Diagnose and troubleshoot equipment malfunctions, identifying root causes and   implementing corrective actions. -   Execute timely and effective repairs to minimize downtime and production   losses.   Equipment Calibration and Adjustments  - - Calibrate and adjust production machinery to   meet specified operating parameters and quality standards. -   Monitor and verify equipment settings to maintain product quality and   consistency   Documentation and Reporting  -   - Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, including work performed, parts used, and any additional recommendations for future improvements. - Generate reports on equipment performance and maintenance history for analysis and decision-making.    Safety and Compliance  -    - Adhere to all safety protocols, including lockout/tagout procedures, while performing maintenance tasks. - Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and best practices in maintenance operations.    Inventory Management  -    - Monitor and request necessary spare parts and supplies for equipment maintenance. - Maintain an organized inventory of spare parts, tools, and equipment    Collaboration and Communication -    - Coordinate with production operators and other maintenance team members to optimize workflow and minimize disruptions. - Communicate effectively with the Maintenance Supervisor regarding maintenance activities, resource needs, and equipment performance  Continuous Improvement -    - Participate in root cause analysis and contribute to the development of preventive maintenance strategies. - Identify opportunities for process enhancements to improve equipment reliability and efficiency.  Preferred candidate profile     - BE / Diploma or equivalent; technical certification in maintenance or related field is a plus. - Proven experience in maintenance and repair of production equipment, preferably in a manufacturing environment. - Strong knowledge of mechanical, electrical, and hydraulic systems. - Familiarity with PLC systems and automated production equipment. - Ability to read technical manuals, schematics, and blueprints. - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. - Effective communication and teamwork abilities. - Willingness to work in various environmental conditions (e.g., heat, cold, confined spaces). - Willingness to work 12 hour rotating shifts and weekends Perks and benefits   $1800 - $2200 per month + Accommodation + Visa + Air Ticket
column11: Documentation and Reporting, Safety and Compliance, Troubleshooting and Repairs, Equipment Calibration and Adjustments, Routine Maintenance, Inventory Management, Continuous Improvement, Collaboration and Communication

column2: The Fire Fighting Site Supervisor is responsible for overseeing the fire protection and safety operations on construction sites or industrial facilities. The role involves supervising the installation, maintenance, and inspection of fire fighting equipment, ensuring compliance with safety regulations, and coordinating emergency response activities. Key Responsibilities: Supervision and Management: Oversee the daily operations of fire fighting teams on-site. Ensure all fire protection systems (sprinklers, alarms, extinguishers) are installed and maintained correctly. Manage and coordinate the work schedules and duties of fire safety personnel. Compliance and Safety: Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal fire safety regulations. Conduct regular fire safety audits and risk assessments. Implement and enforce fire safety policies and procedures. Training and Drills: Organize and conduct fire safety training sessions for staff. Plan and execute fire drills and emergency evacuation procedures. Provide guidance and support during emergency situations. Maintenance and Inspection: Regularly inspect fire protection equipment and systems to ensure functionality. Coordinate routine maintenance and repairs of fire fighting equipment. Keep detailed records of inspections, maintenance activities, and safety drills. Coordination and Communication: Liaise with site management, construction teams, and external fire safety inspectors. Communicate fire safety plans and procedures to all personnel on-site. Report any fire safety incidents and corrective actions taken. Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of fire safety activities, inspections, and incidents. Prepare and submit regular reports to management on fire safety status and improvements. Working Conditions: This role requires working on construction sites, industrial facilities, or other high-risk environments. The position may involve working in various weather conditions and may require wearing protective gear. The role may require standing, walking, climbing ladders, and operating fire safety equipment. Key Competencies: Attention to detail Problem-solving skills Ability to remain calm under pressure Strong organizational skills Commitment to safety and regulatory compliance

column2: About the Company: We are establishing a state-of-the-art first-ever Li-ion Cell Gigafactory in India, and we are seeking a skilled Maintenance Planner to join our dynamic team. The Maintenance Planner will play a crucial role in ensuring the efficient operation of our automated cell manufacturing facilities by developing and implementing comprehensive maintenance plans.  Purpose of the job / Objective     Ensure the smooth operation of machinery and equipment by planning, coordinating, and overseeing maintenance activities.  To be involved in scheduling routine maintenance, responding to equipment breakdowns, managing spare parts inventory, and optimizing maintenance procedures. Developing and managing maintenance budgets, ensuring cost-effectiveness while maintaining quality standards. Analyze data to improve equipment reliability and efficiency over time through team skills up and new cost-effective ideas. Task and Responsibilities: Will be responsible to develop and maintain preventive maintenance schedules for all equipment within the automated cell manufacturing from Electrode, Assembly, and Formation. Collaborate with vendors and suppliers to procure necessary spare parts and equipment components to ensure ready spares availability at respective stores to reduce downtime. Utilize maintenance management software to track work orders, spare parts inventory, and equipment history. Providing budget estimates, tracking maintenance costs, and justifying expenses related to equipment repairs and replacements. Analyze equipment performance data to identify trends and make recommendations for improvements to enhance reliability and efficiency. Maintaining & periodic review of Equipment & its Manuals master list. Coordination for Internal and external ISO & other audits. Planning & organizing technical and safety training and maintenance team on new equipment, procedures, and best practices to enhance their skills and knowledge. Key Internal Interfaces: Coordinating with maintenance teams, and production departments to ensure timely completion of maintenance activities without disrupting production schedules. Coordinating with procurement to source spare parts, tools, and equipment needed for maintenance activities. Key External Interfaces: Vendors and suppliers: For sourcing spare parts, equipment, and specialized services.  Contractors: For outsourced maintenance work, specialized repairs, or project-based tasks. Educational Qualifications & Experience (for the job/ of the candidate)  Graduate/ Postgraduate in Engineering Years of Experience: (Please detail the depth and breadth of the topics that one should have been exposed to during the tenure in previous organizations) Understanding of manufacturing processes and electrical and mechanical items associated with equipment to effectively plan maintenance schedules and activities. Capability to identify issues, troubleshoot problems and implement solutions to prevent equipment failures and optimize maintenance processes. Through knowledge in using maintenance management software, spreadsheets, and other digital tools to track maintenance activities, schedule tasks, and generate reports. Experience in maintaining accurate records, documenting maintenance activities, and ensuring compliance with safety regulations and maintenance standards. Proficiency in using computerized maintenance management systems, SAP & MES for tracking maintenance activities and scheduling. Preferred/Desired Skills: Effectively plan maintenance schedules and activities. Skill sets to work on maintenance management software, spreadsheets, and other digital tools to track maintenance activities, schedule tasks, and generate reports. Flow Meters, Temperature sensors, Pressure transmitters, Level transmitters & switches, Weight measuring devices, vibrations sensors, Control Valves, shut off valve, Gas Analyzers & Gas skids. 3. Knowledge & Operation of various type of Master calibrators like, dead weight tester, resistance decade box, universal calibrators, RTD and T/C calibrators, CRO, Pressure calibrators, Temperature bath. 4. Greenfield and brownfield project experience of execution, commissioning & testing related to instrumentation assets. 5. Handling of various Control System Configuration, Fault Diagnosis & Maintenance of PLC & DCS system of Siemens make like S7-300, 400, PCS7 (DCS), S7 1500 & 1200 series. Programming will be added advantage. 6. Knowledge of Testing, Commissioning, troubleshooting of HMI and SCADA system of Siemens make like WinCC & TIA Portal. 7. Knowledge of Fault analysis of various automation faults of PLC & SCADA, Network related problem of Profibus and Modbus. Detailed knowledge of Various protocol related to PLC & Instrumentation like TCP/IP, Fiber optic, Profibus, Modbus, HART, RS485 and RS232. 8. Operation, maintenance, commissioning and troubleshooting of Fire alarm system, Compressor, HVAC, CCTV, PA system. 9. column2: Role & responsibilities     Handling day to day production activity with well sound knowledge on engine testing procedures and process.  Ensure on time resource availability for the daily production with efficient man power planning.  Able to carry out Trouble shooting based on thorough knowledge about processes & related issues in the Diesel engines.  Practice lean manufacturing with sound knowledge about 5's, JH, SMED, 7QC TOOLS, Lean system, FMEA & ISO & EMS document monitoring   Manage engine test cell daily activities - PQCDS  Knowledge of vehicle powertrains, engine, exhaust after-treatment systems and emissions;  Relevant work experience of engine emissions testing and data acquisition emission systems;  Good understanding of emission regulation test cycles;   Ability to analyses and to report technical data;  Excellent problem solving and analytical skills;  Ability to work both independently and in a team;  Flexibility to travel domestic & overseas location  Experience within a Japanese work environment is a plus   Will act as the test cell lead for projects of moderate to high complexity, in the testing and development of engines.  It is expected that the Test Engineer will execute testing activities, complete test cell improvement tasks, lead test cell automation efforts, and present results/conclusions to the customer with minimal supervision. This position will require significant time spent in engine test cells.   Work includes performance and emissions development, calibration, and/or validation and compliance testing of engines   In many cases, engine performance test results may be used to demonstrate conformity to state and federal agencies and will be conducted in compliance with domestic & foreign country relevant regulations.  In case of domestic regulations, should be well versed with CPCB, Trem, CEV at ARAI or any other testing agencies.  Knowledge with MEXA Exhaust gas analyzer, PM measuring units, fuel system, air conditioning systems, sensors, systems electronics will be beneficial  Thorough knowledge on ISO systems mainly ISO 15550, ISO 3046, ISO 8178  Preferred candidate profile   Male/Female candidate

column2: Role & responsibilities   Good English Communication is required for this job  1. Planning, organization and coordination: 1) According to the PMC work order and the actual production situation, arrange and implement the production plan of this workshop to ensure the production schedule and delivery time; 2) Feedback abnormal production problems in time, and cooperate with ME, PRJ, QA, IE and other departments to jointly solve and control abnormal problems; Major anomalies are upgraded and handled in time according to the process; 3) Reasonably allocate personnel and equipment, adjust production layout and corresponding tools, and improve production efficiency; 4) Actively participate in lean improvement activities, carry out Finshmark, SGA, IKW and special follow-up, and improve OEE and UPH. 2. Site management and process control 1) Promote 5S field management system and realize standardized management of production workshop; Control the discipline and operation of field personnel; 2) Regularly inspect and assess the 5S implementation of workshop employees, implement rewards and punishments, and ensure the implementation of the system; 3) Implement the company's execution projects and investigate hidden dangers such as CTR/CTS; 4) Analyze the cost consumption of workshop and formulate operable cost control methods; 5) Improve the excellent rate and utilization rate of the process and reduce scrapping; Ensure quality control and eliminate customer complaints; 6) Accuracy of data, mainly the accuracy of all kinds of statements and inventory. Reduce overdue or sluggish inventory; 3. Safety control: 1) Improve the safety awareness of employees, require employees to operate equipment according to regulations, and avoid accidents; 2) Establish a safety inspection mechanism to prevent problems; 3) Implement and implement according to the requirements of the company to ensure product safety; 4. Team Building and Corporate Culture 1) Employee training: Train employees in accordance with SOP standard operation, post knowledge, safety matters, etc.; 2) Echelon talent construction: selecting left and right hands at all levels, formulating development plans, regular counseling, and correcting growth 3) Cultural construction: the transfer of cultural information of companies and departments; Implementation and innovation of care measures package; 4) Subordinate selection and promotion mechanism and process optimization;  Preferred candidate profile   Education : B.Tech or Engineering degree Required Experience : 5+ years Knowledge : "Master the seven skills of QC; Knowledge of Lean Production (JIT/TPM/SGA/) Knowledge of ISO9001/140001 Master 5why and 8D analysis knowledge Understand the basics of FMEA" Skills :  Man:-  (1) Labor and its contractor control. (2) Shop floor management Machine:-  (1) Master knowledge of machinery, electricity, fool proofing and Process  Improvement  (2) Master operation of computer and software Method:-  (1) Daily plan vs actual report, SOP/WI/Testing procedures. (2) 5S & 3R Implementation. (3) Master knowledge of FMEA, 8D, TPM, PDCA, Lean manufacturing, JIT,Kaizen, 7Q tools, FIFO, RCA & Capa report (4) Must knows abnormal handling methods. Plan organization and execution:  Use production plan management logic and PDCA tools, follow SMART principle and time management requirements to decompose production plans and work tasks and follow up to achieve goals. Problem analysis and solution : Using 5Why, 5A and other tools and methods, the routine problems in production site can be quickly solved through Mini Win-Win platform, and the problems can be quickly solved to resume production. Communication and coordination:  Familiar with the process responsibilities and emotional management methods of each team, and use communication skills and winning expression to achieve team goals. Team management:  Use JD to identify weaknesses, and achieve talent training goals through IDP ability training tools and counseling methods Site management: Understand the site planning logic and use the tools and methods of benchmarking and 5S to implement and achieve site management objectives. Lean improvement : Use TPM logic and IKW/SGA/ECRS improvement methods to participate in the organization as a member to carry out improvement activities and achieve improvement goals. Abilities : Proactive Bear hardships and stand hard work Learn and grow Team management Comm. and cordination Plan management and execution Goal oriented  Perks and benefits   Subsidized Canteen & Transportation Family Health Insurance  Reward & Recognitions Performance Incentive/ Profit sharing

The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in quality  assurance and control within a manufacturing environment, specifically with a background in  mechanical engineering. Key Responsibilities: Quality Assurance:  Implement and monitor QC procedures to ensure product quality and  consistency. Documentation : Maintain detailed records of quality control processes, including test  results and inspection reports. Process Improvement : Identify and recommend improvements to QC processes to  enhance product quality and operational efficiency. Compliance:  Ensure all products and processes comply with industry standards and  regulations. Team Collaboration:  Work closely with production and engineering teams to  address quality issues and implement corrective actions. Training:  Assist in training production staff on quality control procedures and best  practices. Reporting:  Prepare regular quality reports for management review. Qualifications: Education: BE/B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering.   Experience : 1 to 4 years of experience in a Quality Control department, preferably in  a manufacturing setting.   Skills : Strong knowledge of quality control principles and practices. Proficient in using QC tools and equipment for inspection and testing. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Attention to detail with a commitment to producing high-quality work. Effective communication and teamwork abilities. Familiarity with industry standards and regulatory requirements related to  graphite electrode manufacturing is a plus. Compensation: Salary:  Competitive, with no bar for deserving candidates. Vacancies:  2 positions available.

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a detail-oriented and diligent Material Handler to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for efficiently handling materials within our warehouse or production facility. Responsibilities include lifting, moving, packing, and unpacking products or machined pieces for inspection or measurements. The Material Handler will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth flow of materials throughout the production process. Responsibilities : Safely and efficiently lift and move materials using appropriate equipment and techniques. Pack and unpack products or machined pieces according to established procedures. Could you conduct inspections and measurements on materials as required? Maintain accurate records of materials movement and inventory levels. Collaborate with team members to ensure timely completion of tasks and meet production deadlines. Adhere to all safety protocols and procedures to prevent accidents and injuries. Maintain a clean and organized work environment. Requirements: Proven experience as a material handler or similar role in a warehouse or manufacturing setting. Strong physical stamina and ability to lift and move heavy objects repeatedly. Familiarity with material handling equipment such as forklifts, pallet jacks, and hand trucks. Attention to detail and ability to follow instructions accurately. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team. Basic computer skills for record-keeping and inventory management. Join our team and become an integral part of our operations as we strive for excellence in material handling and production efficiency.   Thanks & Regards "Your Manpower Manager"   Nancy Batham Executive  TA Phone - 6262000430 Website:  www.ashkom.com

column2: Role & responsibilities   Position Overview: As a Production Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in optimizing our manufacturing processes, ensuring efficient production, and maintaining product quality standards. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas for improvement, implement innovative solutions, and drive continuous process enhancements. This position offers an exciting opportunity to utilize your technical expertise and problem-solving skills to contribute to the success of our organization.  Experience in sheet metal and Bending work Key Responsibilities: Process Optimization:  Analyze current production processes to identify opportunities for improvement in efficiency, productivity, and cost-effectiveness. Continuous Improvement:  Lead and participate in continuous improvement initiatives to enhance manufacturing processes, reduce waste, and increase overall productivity. Quality Assurance:  Collaborate with the quality assurance team to ensure that products meet quality standards and regulatory requirements. Equipment Maintenance:  Oversee the maintenance and repair of production equipment to minimize downtime and ensure optimal performance. Troubleshooting:  Investigate and resolve production issues in a timely manner, implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence. Documentation:  Maintain accurate documentation of production processes, procedures, and changes to facilitate knowledge transfer and compliance with regulatory requirements. Cross-Functional Collaboration:  Work closely with cross-functional teams, including manufacturing, engineering, and supply chain, to drive alignment and achieve production goals. Training and Development:  Provide training and support to production staff to ensure adherence to standard operating procedures and promote a culture of continuous improvement. Safety Compliance:  Promote a safe working environment by adhering to safety protocols, conducting risk assessments, and implementing safety improvements as needed. Project Management:  Lead and/or support projects related to process improvement, equipment upgrades, and new product introductions from conception to implementation. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, or related field. Proven experience in a manufacturing environment, preferably in a production engineering role(HVAC) Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze complex data and identify areas for improvement. Proficiency in CAD software and manufacturing process simulation tools. Excellent problem-solving abilities with a hands-on approach to troubleshooting. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Project management experience with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Knowledge of lean manufacturing principles and continuous improvement methodologies is desirable. Familiarity with regulatory requirements and quality management systems (ISO 9001, ISO 13485, etc.) is a plus.
column11: HVAC, Production Management, Production Engineering, Production Supervising, Assembly Planning, Air Conditioning, Production Planning, Ducting, Daily Production Planning, Manpower Handling, Manufacturing Management

column2: We are currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Draughtsman to join our HVAC Coil Manufacturing Design team. The successful candidate will be integral to our design process, responsible for preparing accurate and detailed HVAC equipment coil drawings based on customer specifications or data sheets from coil selection software. This role is crucial for maintaining the precision and efficiency of our manufacturing process, enabling us to continue providing our customers with high-quality, tailor-made coil replacements. Key Responsibilities: Create detailed drawings of HVAC coils using AutoCAD, based on specifications provided by customers or generated from coil selection software, in coordination with the Sales/Application team.? Ensure drawings are accurate, conform to standards, and meet all necessary specifications for manufacturing. After drawing preparation, obtain customer approval before releasing it to production to ensure all requirements are met and the client is satisfied with the design. Work closely with the manufacturing team to translate drawings into practical, manufacturable designs (CAM). Manage multiple drafting projects simultaneously, adjusting priorities as needed to meet tight deadlines. Collaborate with the design team to innovate and improve design processes and outputs. Adapt to on-site challenges and provide creative solutions to unforeseen problems during the design and manufacturing phases. Stay updated with the latest drafting technologies and HVAC industry trends to continually enhance the efficiency and quality of designs. Requirements: A minimum of 3 to 5 years of experience in mechanical drafting, including at least 2 to 3 years in an HVAC unit manufacturing environment. Technical qualification in Mechanical Engineering (DME) or equivalent, with formal training in AutoCAD. Proficiency in AutoCAD is mandatory, with a strong ability to produce detailed and precise drawings. Experience with CAM programming and familiarity with additional CAD software is a significant advantage. Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet strict deadlines. Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability to address challenges that may arise during the design and manufacturing processes. A solid understanding of HVAC systems and components, especially coils, is highly preferred.
column11: Draftsman Activities, Drawing, coils, AutoCAD, Detailing, Mechanical Design, Heat Load Calculation, Design, Drafting, HVAC, Boq Preparation, Design Development, Air Conditioning, Heat Ventilation, Design Engineering, Application Engineering, Coating, Refrigeration

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled InDesign Developer with a minimum of 5 years of professional experience. The ideal candidate will have extensive expertise in Adobe InDesign, advanced scripting capabilities, and a deep understanding of PDF creation and management. You will be responsible for developing and optimizing complex design and layout processes, ensuring high-quality output for both digital and print media.          SkillSet: InDesign Developer          Experience: 5+ Years          Engagement Type: Contract to Hire (6 months)          Availability: Immediate to 10 days max. Key Responsibilities:          Develop and implement automated design solutions using Adobe InDesign.          Create, edit, and manage complex InDesign documents and templates, incorporating dynamic data and layout rules.          Ensure the quality and accuracy of PDF outputs for digital and print distribution, including preflight checks and troubleshooting.          Collaborate with developers, graphic designers, and content creators to integrate InDesign workflows with other systems and platforms.          Develop and maintain custom InDesign scripts and plugins using JavaScript, ExtendScript, and other scripting languages.          Optimize InDesign workflows using XML, GREP, and other advanced InDesign features.          Develop plugins in InDesign for Automation tasks.          Stay updated with the latest InDesign and PDF technologies, plugins, and best practices.          Provide technical support and training to team members on advanced InDesign functionalities and scripting techniques. Technical Requirements:          Minimum of 5 years of experience with Adobe InDesign, including advanced features and scripting. column2: Role Objective   We are seeking a highly skilled composite manufacturing associate with experience in aerospace composite manufacturing to join our team. Work closely with engineering teams to fabricate composite components for drone airframes, ensuring adherence to design specifications and quality standards.? Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities   Operate and maintain various composite manufacturing equipment, including but not limited to, autoclaves, vacuum bagging systems, and composite curing ovens.? Prepare composite materials, such as pre-preg carbon fiber, fiberglass, and epoxy resins, for layup and bonding processes.? Perform layup of composite materials onto molds, ensuring proper orientation, ply sequence, and resin distribution.? Conduct trimming, drilling, sanding, painting and finishing operations on composite parts to achieve final dimensions and surface quality.? Assist in the development and optimization of composite manufacturing processes to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and enhance product performance.? Conduct quality inspections on fabricated composite components using various measurement tools and techniques, such as calipers, micrometers, ? Document work activities, process parameters, and inspection results in accordance with company procedures and industry standards.? Collaborate with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot manufacturing issues, implement corrective actions, and drive continuous improvement initiatives.? Adhere to all safety protocols and procedures to ensure a safe working environment for oneself and colleagues.? Qualifications:   ITI/Diploma, Mechanical or a related field? Minimum of 2?years of experience in composite manufacturing process engineering ? Skills and Abilities    Knowledge on the composites, vacuum bagging, layup sequence and aero structure grade raw materials?? Knowledge of the fabrics, fibers of carbon, glass, Kevlar etc. and their properties and use.? Knowledge on the detailed painting process: Buffing, surface preparation, pore filling, primers, paints, and other coat used in aviation and in UAVs ?? Plastic bonding. composite to composite, composite to metal, plastics to composites Basics knowledge on, excel, ppt is desired but not mandatory ?? Knowledge of safety and regulatory requirements related to composite manufacturing? Familiarity with ISO and AS9100 quality standards would be a plus? Personal Attributes:   Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills? Excellent communication and interpersonal skills? Ability to work independently and as part of a team? Strong attention to detail and a commitment to quality? Target oriented and active in meeting the deadlines and self-motivated? Working Conditions:   This is a full-time position based in Noida, UP that may require occasional evening or weekend work? Salary and Benefits:   Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications? Health insurance? Paid time off and holidays? Opportunities for professional development and growth? Application Process:   To apply, please submit a resume outlining your qualifications and experience as they relate to this position. ?

column2: Job Objective Seeking a candidate who has the acumen and zeal to work in Indias largest industrial hemp company with a core responsibility to undertake quality control and production coordination for the companies products. Job Description - Schedules and coordinates flow of work within or between departments of manufacturing plant to expedite production. - Maintain records and report quality of goods, raw material & packaging material received at the factory. - Maintain quantity, stock levels, delivery times, transport costs and efficiency. - Monitor productivity rates and product standards and implement quality control programmes. - Collate and analyse data, putting together production reports.  - Prepares batch by batch production reports. - Locate vendors of materials, equipment, or supplies, and interview them in order to determine product availability and terms of sales. - Review purchase order claims and contracts for conformance to company policy. - Prepare and process requisitions and purchase orders for supplies and equipment. - Strategically plan and manage logistics, warehouse, transportation, and customer services - Recommends response to complaints, considering test reports, production records, legal standards, and complaint validity. - Monitor and report on the performance of selected vendors to ensure delivery in line with contractual obligations and performance metrics. - Maintaining an up-to-date data base of the logistics options and cost effectively connecting consignments - Resolve problems concerning transportation, logistics systems, imports or exports, or customer issues. - Develop and implement quality control standards for inbound and outbound goods. - Ensure storage of items in an orderly and accessible manner in warehouses, tool rooms, supply rooms, or other areas - Verify inventory computations by comparing them to physical counts of stock, and investigate discrepancies or adjust errors Education - UG: Any Graduate: Bachelor in Pharmacy or Production Engineer - PG: Any Post Graduate: Any Specialization - Doctorate: Not Required Skills - Critical thinking, logic and reasoning - Specialized knowledge in production process and vendor management - Specialized knowledge of the on-ground function of logistics - Knowledge of laws, legal codes pertaining to logistics and operations - Coordination, negotiation & personal management - Proactive at identifying bottlenecks and implement solutions. - Knowledge of manufacturing quality standards - Perseverance, persistence, courteous & empathetic and a drive to perform. - Strong oral and written communication skills. - Hands on with MS Office and emails
column11: Medical QC, Production, Quality Control, vendor management, logistics operations, manufacturing quality, purchase order, warehouse, Medical Quality Control, transportation, raw material, record maintenance, Quality Assurance, production engineering

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and innovative Production Manager for our garment factory. The ideal candidate should possess knowledge of lean production concepts and 5S methodologies, along with a strong willingness to learn and innovate. Experience is not a constraint as we value potential and the ability to adapt and grow in the role. Key Responsibilities: Production Planning and Control: Develop and implement production schedules to meet daily and weekly targets. Monitor production processes to ensure that products are manufactured on schedule and within quality standards. Lean Manufacturing Implementation: Apply lean production concepts to optimize production workflows and eliminate waste. Continuously seek opportunities to improve production processes and increase efficiency. 5S Methodology: Implement and maintain 5S standards in the production area. Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with 5S principles. Quality Management: Ensure that all products meet or exceed company quality standards. Work closely with the quality control team to address any quality issues promptly. Team Leadership and Development: Manage and motivate a team of production workers, supervisors, and line leaders. Provide training and support to staff to foster a culture of continuous improvement. Inventory and Resource Management: Oversee the procurement and management of raw materials to ensure availability for production. Coordinate with the inventory team to manage stock levels and minimize waste. Health and Safety: Ensure a safe working environment by adhering to health and safety regulations. Promote a culture of safety among all employees. Innovation and Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends and technological advancements. Encourage and implement innovative ideas to improve production processes.
column11: garments, production, 5s methodologies, health & safety

column2: Press Tool and Jigs & Fixture Design Engineer - 2 Openings Role & Responsibilities: Design and detail press tools. Execute drawings and create bills of materials. Create final drawings for final machining detail and assembly detail. Follow engineering standards for selecting raw materials for required products. Independently design tools and manufacture sheet metal components. Design press tools such as blanking, piercing, restricting, forming, bending, etc. Design progressive press tools. Lead all activities of tool design and development from the conceptual through detail phases, including post-design support. Perform component feasibility studies and involvement in quoting tool costs. Design die layouts and press tools. Design tools for critical press parts, including progressive dies and multi-slide tools. Preferred candidate profile Proficient in AutoCAD. Should have  more than 2+ years of experience with any of the following software: NX CAD, SolidWorks, CATIA, or ZWCAD.  CNC Milling VMC Programmer cum Operator - 2 Openings Role & Responsibilities: Strong knowledge in VMC manual programming. Responsible for the quality of parts produced on the shop floor. Ability to read and understand drawings and work instructions. Capable of calculating cycle time and cost estimates based on part drawings. Basic knowledge of selecting tool holders, work holding devices, cutting tools, inserts, and cutting parameters. Proficient in using measurement instruments like micrometers, vernier calipers, height gauges, and profile projectors. Ability to train personnel to program and set VMC machines. Flexible to work in shifts. Preferred candidate profile Minimum 2 years of experience as a CNC Programmer cum Operator Should have experience with any of the following CAM: Matercam, Powermill or Cimatron Send your updated resume to  incitenovlty@gmail.com

column2: Job Title: Production Manager - Sodium Silicate Location: Ankleshwar, Kosamba Job Type: Full -Time Experience: 2 to 3 Years Company Overview:  [ Axolo Ceramic Private Limited ] is a leading manufacturer in the chemical industry, specializing in the production of sodium silicate and other chemical compounds. With a commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability, we strive to meet the diverse needs of our customers while maintaining the highest standards of safety and environmental responsibility. Position Overview:  We are seeking a skilled and experienced Production Manager to oversee our sodium silicate manufacturing operations. The Production Manager will be responsible for managing all aspects of production, ensuring efficient and cost-effective processes, and maintaining the highest standards of quality and safety. Responsibilities: Production Planning and Scheduling: Develop and implement production plans and schedules to meet customer demand while optimizing production efficiency and resource utilization. Coordinate with sales, procurement, and logistics teams to ensure timely delivery of finished products. Process Optimization: Identify opportunities for process improvement and optimization to enhance productivity, reduce costs, and minimize waste. Implement best practices and innovative technologies to streamline production processes and improve overall efficiency. Quality Assurance: Establish and maintain quality control procedures to ensure that products meet or exceed industry standards and customer specifications. Monitor production processes and conduct regular inspections to identify and address any quality issues or deviations. Health and Safety Compliance: Ensure compliance with all health and safety regulations and company policies to maintain a safe working environment for all employees. Implement safety training programs and initiatives to promote a culture of safety awareness and accountability. Team Leadership: Lead and motivate production teams to achieve production targets and performance objectives. Provide guidance, coaching, and training to team members to enhance their skills and capabilities. Inventory Management: Manage raw material and finished goods inventory levels to ensure adequate stock availability while minimizing inventory holding costs. Implement inventory control measures to optimize inventory turnover and reduce the risk of stockouts or overages.   Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Chemical Engineering, Manufacturing Engineering, or a related field. Minimum of 3 years of experience in production management, preferably in the chemical manufacturing industry. Strong technical knowledge of sodium silicate production processes and equipment. Proven track record of successfully managing production operations and driving process improvements. Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate teams to achieve results. Solid understanding of health and safety regulations and best practices. Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate cross-functionally and interact with employees at all levels of the organization. Benefits: Competitive salary commensurate with experience Opportunities for career growth and advancement in a dynamic and fast-paced environment If you are a highly motivated and experienced Production Manager with a passion for excellence and a commitment to continuous improvement, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity to join our team  How to Apply:  Please submit your resume to hr@ astrongroup.in detailing your relevant experience and qualifications. Axolo Ceramic Private Limited  is part of Astron Group, promoted by its directors Mr. Upesh Thakkar and Mr. Gaurav Thakkar. The group was promoted by Late Mr. Hasmukh Bhai Thakkar. The group is having a well renowned name in Ceramic Industries and Glass Bottle Industry. They offer an extensive range of products such as Zircon, Frit, Ceramic Mixture, Sodium Silicate, Dyes Intermediates, Gas trading. Astron Group did a turnover of more than INR 2000.0 Crs in FY23-24. Before applying, please read about Sunrise glass industry Private Limited Website: www.sunrisegipl.com and Astron Group website: www.astrongroup.in   CRISIL rating rationale https://www.crisilratings.com/mnt/winshare/Ratings/RatingList/RatingDocs/SunriseGlassInd ustriesPrivateLimited_January%2002,%202024_RR_333865.html

column2: Role & responsibilities  :    Process Engineer will be a part of a project team, led by a project manager; such Team will include other discipline specialists (e.g. mechanical, rotary, piping, instrumentation, etc);  Process Engineer is required to work with such Team in a positive and constructive manner, leading to a successful project. Process Engineer is responsible to review comments/ challenges expressed by other Team members and to lead resolution of such comments/ challenges which are linked to/ emanate from a process engineering perspective.     One should able to understand the chemistry and unit operations of a project; this is achieved by an understanding of the basic chemistry of a process and of the primary process documents e.g. heat & mass balance (HMB), process flow diagrams (PFD), process & instrument diagrams (PID), specifications & composition of products, by-products, effluents, handling & treatment of products, by-products, effluents, etc.  Process Engineer is expected to know how to read and to understand other typical process documents too e.g. process data sheets (PDS), process data for instruments, cause & effect diagrams, norms for material selection, critical operating parameters including the manual, process guarantees with respect to products, by-products, effluents, of utilities needed for operations of catalysts needed for operations, etc.  Process Engineer is expected to be able to connect the various process documents (i.e. HMB, PFD & PID) with the other process documents like PDS, etc.  Process Engineer with an ability to create above process documents such as those described above and to review any process document as created by an engineer within M11 OR by an external engineering entity OR by a supplier OR by a contractor, is a strong requirement for this role.  Process Engineer will support the operations team with intent to troubleshoot and to improve the performance of the processing unit e.g. ability to process varying feedstock, enhancing throughput, better product quality & quantity, lower effluents, energy conservation, etc.  Process Engineer is expected to continually upgrade her/ his knowledge with respect to international & national codes & standards, specifications, good operational practices, etc. Preferred candidate profile  :    More than years in the role as an engineer who has successfully operated and/ or engineered industrial projects. B.Tech/B.E  in Chemical / Mechanical Engineering.

column1: Factory Incharge - Printing & Signage Manufacturing and Installation
column2: About Us: We are a leading Printing & Signage manufacturing and installation company, catering to top brands across India. Our single facility handles PAN India operations, ensuring high-quality products and timely delivery. With a dedicated team of 25 professionals, we pride ourselves on innovation, precision, and customer satisfaction. Job Summary: The Factory Incharge will oversee the daily operations of our manufacturing facility, ensuring efficient production, quality control, and timely delivery of our printing and signage products. This role requires strong leadership, excellent organizational skills, and a keen eye for detail to maintain the highest standards of quality and safety. The Factory Incharge will also coordinate directly with customers from the beginning of the requirement to the final handover, ensuring exceptional customer service and satisfaction. Key Responsibilities: 1. Operational Management: - Supervise and coordinate all manufacturing activities within the facility. - Develop and implement production schedules to meet customer demands and deadlines. - Monitor and optimize production processes to maximize efficiency and minimize waste. 2. Quality Control: - Ensure all products meet the company's quality standards and customer specifications. - Implement and maintain quality control procedures and protocols. - Address and resolve any quality issues promptly. 3. Customer Coordination: - Serve as the primary point of contact for customers from the initial requirement gathering to the final handover. - Understand customer needs and specifications and communicate them effectively to the production team. - Provide regular updates to customers on project progress and address any concerns or changes in requirements. - Ensure timely and accurate delivery of products to clients, maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction. 4. Team Leadership: - Lead, train, and motivate a team of 25 employees, fostering a positive and productive work environment. - Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback. - Identify training needs and facilitate professional development opportunities. 5. Safety and Compliance: - Ensure the facility complies with all health, safety, and environmental regulations. - Conduct regular safety audits and implement corrective actions as necessary. - Promote a culture of safety awareness among all employees. 6. Inventory and Resource Management: - Manage inventory levels of raw materials and finished products. - Coordinate with suppliers to ensure timely procurement of materials. - Optimize resource utilization to reduce costs and improve profitability. 7. Continuous Improvement: - Identify opportunities for process improvements and implement innovative solutions. - Stay updated with industry trends and advancements in printing and signage technology. - Lead initiatives to enhance productivity, quality, and customer satisfaction. Qualifications: - Bachelors degree in Industrial Engineering, Manufacturing, Business Management, or a related field. - Minimum of 5 years of experience in a manufacturing leadership role, preferably in the printing and signage industry. - Strong understanding of manufacturing processes, quality control, and inventory management. - Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. - Proficient in using manufacturing software and tools. - Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively. - Proven experience in customer relationship management. Benefits: - Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. - Health and wellness benefits. - Professional development and training opportunities. - Supportive and dynamic work environment. How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and qualifications to info@brandpulsecreatives.com Please include "Factory Incharge Application - [Your Name]" in the subject line.
column11: Factory manager, Signage, Printing, Production incharge, Production Management, Manufacturing Industry, Acp, Fabrication, Lamination, Laser Cutting, signage installation, Factory Operations, Acrylic
